**Elementary**

The `MetroInfoTile` can be used to have a flat info tile much looking like the metro tiles in e.g., Windows 8/10.

```jsx
import { MetroInfoTile } from 'precise-ui';
const image = 'data:image/png;base64,';

<MetroInfoTile title="Some title" image={image} />
```

The tiles are perfect to be fit in a `StackPanel`, especially with wrapping they are automatically responsive.

```jsx
import { MetroInfoTile, StackPanel, StackPanelDirection } from 'precise-ui';

<StackPanel direction={StackPanelDirection.leftToRight} wrap>
  <MetroInfoTile title="A" onClick={() => alert('Hi from A')} />
  <MetroInfoTile title="C" to="/internal/url" />
  <MetroInfoTile title="E" href="https://zeiss.com" target="_blank" />
  <MetroInfoTile title="G" onClick={() => console.log('Hi from G')} />
</StackPanel>
```
